column3: str
Alisaie is nodding approvingly at the sutlers.
Speak with Conrad.
Speak with Alisaie.
Hardly surprising. Where there is war, there is profit to be had.
If you need to buy anything, now might be a good time.
Come to take the measure of our friendly neighborhood merchants?
They're a bold lot, that much is plain. If the imperials found out they were peddling their wares to the Resistance, they would be lucky to escape with their lives.
'Tis a gamble, aye, and I admire their courage. But their motives could hardly be said to be altruistic...
Ah, here you are. I've been looking all over for you.
We've finished discussing your proposal, and we're ready to receive you all back at the tent.
I've sent someone to fetch Y'shtola and Krile, so if you'd like to follow me...
We'll begin once the others arrive.
Sorry to have kept you waiting, but matters such as these demand due deliberation.
What a relief! For a moment there, I really wasn't sure which way it was going to go...
Krile and I shall remain here for now. Should you have need of us, you are welcome to visit.

I briefly dabbled with similar methods involving distillations and infusions of herbal extracts, but I must confess to knowing little and less of Ala Mhigan traditional medicine. Would that I knew more, for its effectiveness exceeds all expectations...
Now that we've dealt with the formalities, we can get to work. I'm glad you're with us, friend.
Heh! As if there were any doubt!
Pinch me if I'm dreaming, because I'd swear it's finally happening. The whole of Eorzea, committed at last to the liberation of Ala Mhigo!
Right, then. M'naago and Meffrid are to be our keepers.
Knowing naught of what they require, one task is as good as the other. Make your choice, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>.
Your <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>aether compass<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> may now be used to locate aether currents in new regions!
If you have misplaced your compass, you may obtain another by speaking with Gibrillont at the Forgotten Knight, or Gaufrid at Rhalgr's Reach.
